hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: IMAGE_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Path to a raw disk image or a directory prefix. If a directory is specified, looks for dirname.img and attempts to inject AMI name in clovr.conf upon successful build

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: INIT_SCRIPT
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Script to run before bundling the EC2 image

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: TAR
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Generate tar of image directory on success. Only valid if IMAGE_NAME is a directory

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: cd /mnt sudo -E /opt/vappio-util/vp-bundle-ec2 -p -f $IMAGE_NAME $INIT_SCRIPT if [ "$TAR" = "true" ] then curl http://localhost:8888/job/Tar%20image/buildWithParameters?IMAGE_DIR=$IMAGE_NAME fi
